name: Parade Ground
description: A long, flat expanse of hard-packed earth. Faded paint marks still visible—lines and boundaries from some former purpose. Posts with tattered ribbons mark a processional route.
lighting_quality: Exposed and bright. No shade. Sky dominates. Dust catches light.
temperature_range: Hot and dry. Heat rises in waves from the ground.
acoustic_quality: Open and dispersing. Sound carries far but weakens. Wind interferes.
objects_present: Drums (two large, one small, sitting in the sun)
Flags on poles (colors bleached to pastels)
architectural_features: Faded boundary lines painted on ground
atmosphere: Performative and exposed. A space demanding spectacle.
